panels.description: Count of invalid claims made by honest actors.
panels.title: Honest Actor Errors

panels.description: Number of withdrawal requests that diverge from the credits mapping.
panels.title: Divergent Credits

panels.description: Number of bonds lost by an honest actor.
panels.title: Lost Bonds

panels.description: Tracked games broken down by actual status
panels.title: Games

panels.description: Tracked games broken down by actual status
panels.title: Game Agreement

targets.expr: max by (cluster, namespace, stack_optimism_io_network, honest_actor_address, state) (op_dispute_mon_honest_actor_claims{cluster=${cluster:doublequote},namespace=${namespace:doublequote},stack_optimism_io_network=${network:doublequote}})

max by (cluster, namespace, stack_optimism_io_network, honest_actor_address, state) (op_dispute_mon_honest_actor_bonds{cluster=${cluster:doublequote},namespace=${namespace:doublequote},stack_optimism_io_network=${network:doublequote}})
count_over_time ({cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", network="$network"} | logfmt lvl | label_format level=lvl | level != "" | drop node_name, pod [5m])
{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", network="$network"} |= `` | logfmt | lvl =~ `err?or` | label_format level=lvl
{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", network="$network"} |= `` | logfmt | lvl = `warn` | label_format level=lvl
